name: cld-omnisearch
description: Unified search across Tavily, Brave, Kagi, Exa, GitHub, Perplexity, Jina AI, and Firecrawl with 13 powerful tools

env.MSTY_TAVILY_API_KEY: {TAVILY_API_KEY:Your Tavily API key for web search:}
env.MSTY_BRAVE_API_KEY: {BRAVE_API_KEY:Your Brave Search API key for web search:}
env.MSTY_KAGI_API_KEY: {KAGI_API_KEY:Your Kagi API key for web search and summarization:}
env.MSTY_PERPLEXITY_API_KEY: {PERPLEXITY_API_KEY:Your Perplexity API key for AI-powered search:}
env.MSTY_JINA_API_KEY: {JINA_API_KEY:Your Jina AI API key for URL reading and grounding:}
env.MSTY_EXA_API_KEY: {EXA_API_KEY:Your Exa AI API key for semantic search and content extraction:}
env.MSTY_FIRECRAWL_API_KEY: {FIRECRAWL_API_KEY:Your Firecrawl API key for web scraping and crawling:}
env.MSTY_GITHUB_TOKEN: {GITHUB_TOKEN:Your GitHub personal access token for code search:}

web_search.description: Search the web using Tavily, Brave, Kagi, or Exa

github_search.description: Search GitHub repositories, code, and users

ai_search.description: AI-powered search with reasoning using Perplexity, Kagi FastGPT, or Exa Answer

firecrawl_process.description: Process URLs with Firecrawl (scrape, crawl, map, extract, actions)

exa_process.description: Process URLs with Exa AI (get contents or find similar pages)

jina_reader_process.description: Convert URLs to LLM-friendly markdown using Jina Reader

kagi_summarizer_process.description: Summarize web content using Kagi Summarizer

tavily_extract_process.description: Extract structured data from URLs using Tavily

jina_grounding_enhance.description: Enhance content with factual grounding using Jina AI

kagi_enrichment_enhance.description: Enrich content with additional context using Kagi FastGPT

categories.processing: firecrawl_process, exa_process, jina_reader_process, kagi_summarizer_process, tavily_extract_process (5 tools)

notes.auto_approval_recommendation: For read-only operations (all search, processing, and enhancement tools), you can enable auto-approval in Msty Studio's Toolset configuration UI. All tools in this MCP server are safe for auto-approval as they only read/retrieve data and do not modify external systems.
notes.required_for_full_functionality: All 8 API keys are optional. The server will only load tools for which you provide valid API keys.
notes.minimal_setup: Start with just TAVILY_API_KEY for basic web search, then add others as needed.
notes.documentation: See MSTY_SETUP.md for detailed setup instructions
